# homepage of php-lod package, offering phpCsv2Rdf service 

= Introduction =
This page describes a set of tools that provide online services for linking open data.

 * the source of this package can be found at http://code.google.com/p/lod-apps/source/browse/#svn/trunk/php-lod

= Software Package =
== dependencies ==
 * phpRdfNode => phpWebUtil
 * phpRdfStream => phpRdfNode, phpWebUtil
 * phpCsv2Rdf => phpRdfStream, phpRdfNode, phpWebUtil

== phpCsv2Rdf ==
Convert online CSV data into RDF, N-Triples or N-Quads.

 * An instance of this service is available at http://onto.rpi.edu/php-lod/cls-csv2rdf.php.
